channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account data type models an individual CDN account. CDN accounts contain references to the SoftLayer customer account they belong to, login credentials for upload services, and a CDN account’s status. Please contact SoftLayer sales to purchase or cancel a CDN account Local accountId The internal identifier of the customer account that a CDN account belongs to. Type: integer
